author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 25-day entrepreneurship development programme will be held from February 8 to March 7.

Science or engineering graduates or diploma holders with at least three years experience, who are aged between 22 and 35 years, can apply. The government-sponsored programme is being organised by PSG College of Arts and Science and FICCI FLO. For queries, e-mailpsgedc@gmail.comor call 9443760648, 9894769935, 9443338935 or 9363104733.

Training for forest officers

Thirty-four trainee officers of the State Forest Service from Rajasthan and Kerala are undergoing a 12-day “Field Engineering Training on Forest Watershed Management” at the Central Academy for State Forest Service, Coimbatore, from Monday. It is organised by the Indian Institute of Soil and Water Conservation, Regional Centre, Udhagamandalam.

At the inaugural, Project Director of the HADP and Field Director of Mudumalai Tiger Reserve Srinivas R. Reddy spoke on the importance of soil and water conservation. The training comprises lectures and field experience at the Indian Institute of Soil and Water Conservation Regional Centre.
title: Entrepreneurship development programme
